name: certifiably
content:
certifiably adverb
(OFFICIALLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can or could be certified (= said or written officially or formally): The teas, coffees, beers, and a few of the wines are certifiably organic. The president can overturn even a fair conviction and set a certifiably guilty person free. certifiably insane/crazy/mad/loopy/nuts
informal If you say that someone is certifiably insane, you are emphasizing that you think they are behaving in a very silly or stupid way. : Some of the people on these websites sound certifiably insane.
